subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|にせ|yomi=k}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|似せる|tr=niseru||[[copy]], [[imitate]], [[forge]]}}.<ref>{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>
